description: This blueprint represents a Dynatrace Entity
title: Dynatrace Entity

firstSeen.title: First Seen
firstSeen.description: The timestamp at which the entity was first seen, in UTC milliseconds.

lastSeen.title: Last Seen
lastSeen.description: The timestamp at which the entity was last seen, in UTC milliseconds.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: A list of tags of the entity.

description: This blueprint represents a Dynatrace Problem
title: Dynatrace Problem

entityTags.title: Entity Tags
entityTags.description: A list of all entity tags of the problem.

evidenceDetails.title: Evidence Details
evidenceDetails.description: A list of all evidence details of the problem.

managementZones.title: Management Zones
managementZones.description: A list of all management zones that the problem belongs to.

problemFilters.title: Problem Filters
problemFilters.description: A list of alerting profiles that match the problem.

severityLevel.title: Severity Level
severityLevel.description: The severity level of the problem.

startTime.title: Start Time
startTime.description: The start time of the problem, in UTC milliseconds.

endTime.title: End Time
endTime.description: The end time of the problem, in UTC milliseconds.

description: This blueprint represents a Dynatrace SLO
title: Dynatrace SLO

target.title: Target
target.description: The target value of the SLO.

warning.title: Warning
warning.description: The warning value of the SLO. At warning state the SLO is still fulfilled but is getting close to failure.

error.title: Error
error.description: The error of the SLO calculation. If the value differs from NONE, there is something wrong with the SLO calculation.

errorBudget.title: Error Budget
errorBudget.description: The error budget of the calculated SLO.

evaluatedPercentage.title: Evaluated Percentage
evaluatedPercentage.description: The calculated status value of the SLO.

evaluationType.title: Evaluation Type
evaluationType.description: The type of the SLO evaluation.

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: The filter for the SLO evaluation.
